sentences.en: To remove from the throne; depose.
The right to elect chieftains and to depose them.
sentences.cn: 选举和撤换酋长的权利。

sentences.en: It is vital for the lengthy and difficult reconstruction of Libya that Libyans themselves depose Colonel Qaddafi.
sentences.cn: 鉴于利比亚的重建将会漫长而困难，利比亚人民需要自己来罢黜卡扎菲，这十分重要。
